mapper.select:
select distinct s.id, s.supplier_code supplierCode, s.product_classify_ids productClassify, s.supplier_ch_name supplierChName, s.supplier_en_name supplierEnName, s.state_code stateCode, s.contacts, s.company_name companyName, s.contact_number contactNumber, s.contact_phone contactPhone, s.address, s.pid, s.pname, s.cid, s.cname, s.zip_code zipCode, s.ext_setting_id extSettingId, settlement_type settlementType, payment_day paymentDay, tax_receipt tax_receipt, rate, s.buyer_id buyerId,s.status, s.create_user createUser, s.create_time createTime, s.update_time updateTime,s.update_user updateUser, (select GROUP_CONCAT(srl.legal_entity_id) from supplier_rela_legal srl where srl.supplier_info_id = s.id group by s.id) legalEntityIdStr from supplier_info s LEFT JOIN `supplier_rela_legal` srl ON s.`id` = srl.`supplier_info_id`
and s.supplier_code like concat ('%',#{form.supplierCode},'%')
and s.supplier_ch_name like concat ('%',#{form.supplierChName},'%')
and srl.`legal_entity_id` in
#{legalId}
